img_text: N E T W O R K THANK YOU! Your order has been processed and an email confirming your order has been sent to the email address you provided If you notice a WWE Network transaction on your bank card, please be aware that your bank may have placed a temporary authorization on your card that may look like a charge. This is not an actual charge and will be reversed wthi 7 days. It is placed there simply to confirm your billing information you will only be charged by WWE Network after your free trial is over START WATCHING
